mapper.select: select board_no, title, reg_date, view_cnt from tb_notice order by reg_date desc limit 0, 5

select a.board_no, a.title, a.reg_date, b.name, a.view_cnt, a.file_group_no from tb_notice a inner join tb_member b on a.member_no = b.member_no
order by a.board_no desc limit #{begin}, #{listSize}
select count(*) from tb_notice a inner join tb_member b on a.member_no = b.member_no

select a.board_no, a.title, a.reg_date, b.name, a.view_cnt, a.content, a.file_group_no, (select title from tb_notice where board_no<#{boardNo} order by board_no desc limit 1) as prevTitle, (select title from tb_notice where board_no>#{boardNo} order by board_no limit 1) as nextTitle, (select board_no from tb_notice where board_no<#{boardNo} order by board_no desc limit 1) as prevNo, (select board_no from tb_notice where board_no>#{boardNo} order by board_no limit 1) as nextNo from tb_notice a inner join tb_member b on a.member_no = b.member_no where board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: update tb_notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, where board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: select * from tb_file as f inner join tb_notice as q on f.file_group_no = q.file_group_no where f.file_group_no = #{fileGroupNo}
SELECT max(file_group_no) AS fileGroupNo FROM tb_file;
